data.actual_result: Says that you're still in voice chat and shows to others that you're still in voice chat too System Settings: Android 6.0.1
data.expected_result: Should remove you from voice chat when you disconnect
data.short_description: Disconnecting from voice using the disconnect button in the dropdown menu doesn't remove you from voice chat, but does disconnect you
data.steps_to_repro: - Join voice chat - Disconnect from the notification bar (image) - Look at voice chat from mobile
